p.sub: Answering these questions while actively reading the text is good practice for answering the kinds of questions that might appear on the exams. Your answers may also shape the discussions in class.

open_response.prompt: Question: Which of the functional groups on these bases is acting as a base rather than an acid? Given the functional groups structure on the base as depicted at pH 7, would you expect the pKa of the functional group to be higher or lower than 7?
